languages.text: "И пожелать, чтобы на пути твоем сквозь мрак Император даровал тебе откровения, {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}открыл сердце нашему учению{/d}. Если так случится — приходи ко мне, и, может статься, ты решишь ввести наш культ в круг ближних друзей своих".

"And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."
languages.original_text: "И пожелать, чтобы на пути твоем сквозь мрак Император даровал тебе откровения, {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}открыл сердце нашему учению{/d}. Если так случится — приходи ко мне, и, может статься, ты решишь ввести наш культ в круг ближних друзей своих".

traits.locale_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and opens your heart to our teaching. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and opens your heart to our teaching. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."

traits.locale_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “我也同样希望你在黑暗的旅途中，能得到帝皇赐予你的启示，让你{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}敞开心扉，接受我们的教诲{/d}。如果你真的愿意这么做的话，就来找我吧。或许那个时候，你会愿意将我们的教派纳入你的亲密伙伴名单之中。”
languages.original_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."

traits.locale_text: “我也同样希望你在黑暗的旅途中，能得到帝皇赐予你的启示，让你敞开心扉，接受我们的教诲。如果你真的愿意这么做的话，就来找我吧。或许那个时候，你会愿意将我们的教派纳入你的亲密伙伴名单之中。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「あなたの暗黒の旅の最中に、皇帝が啓示を与え、{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}私達の教えに心を開いてくれますように{/d}。その時には私の元に来てください。私達の教団を、近しい友として迎えたくなるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの暗黒の旅の最中に、皇帝が啓示を与え、{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}私達の教えに心を開いてくれますように{/d}。その時には私の元に来てください。私達の教団を、近しい友として迎えたくなるかもしれません」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Y para desearle que, en su viaje a través de la oscuridad, el Emperador le conceda revelaciones y {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}abra su corazón a nuestras enseñanzas{/d}. Si eso pasa, venga a mí, y tal vez decida incluir a nuestro culto en su círculo de amigos íntimos».
languages.original_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."

traits.locale_text: «Y para desearle que, en su viaje a través de la oscuridad, el Emperador le conceda revelaciones y abra su corazón a nuestras enseñanzas. Si eso pasa, venga a mí, y tal vez decida incluir a nuestro culto en su círculo de amigos íntimos».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Und um Euch zu wünschen, dass der Imperator Euch auf Eurer Reise durch die Dunkelheit Offenbarungen schenkt und {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}Euer Herz für unsere Lehre öffnet{/d}. Wenn das geschieht, kommt zu mir, vielleicht entscheidet Ihr ja, unseren Kult in den Kreis Eurer engsten Freunde aufzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."

traits.locale_text: "Und um Euch zu wünschen, dass der Imperator Euch auf Eurer Reise durch die Dunkelheit Offenbarungen schenkt und Euer Herz für unsere Lehre öffnet. Wenn das geschieht, kommt zu mir, vielleicht entscheidet Ihr ja, unseren Kult in den Kreis Eurer engsten Freunde aufzunehmen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Et pour souhaiter que l'Empereur {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}ouvre vos yeux et votre cœur à nos enseignements{/d} au cours de votre périple dans les ténèbres. Si ce devait être le cas, venez me voir ; alors, peut-être accepterez-vous d'inclure notre culte dans votre cercle d'amis. »
languages.original_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."

traits.locale_text: « Et pour souhaiter que l'Empereur ouvre vos yeux et votre cœur à nos enseignements au cours de votre périple dans les ténèbres. Si ce devait être le cas, venez me voir ; alors, peut-être accepterez-vous d'inclure notre culte dans votre cercle d'amis. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Bir de karanlığa olan yolculuğunda İmparator'un sana aydınlanma nasip etmesini ve {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}kalbini öğretilerimize açmasını{/d} dileyeceğiz. Öyle bir şey olur ise gelip beni bul. Belki o zaman tarikatımızı yakın dostların arasına almaya karar verirsin."
languages.original_text: "And to wish that on your journey through the darkness, the Emperor grants you revelations and {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}opens your heart to our teaching{/d}. If that happens, come to me, and perhaps you might decide to make our cult part of your circle of close friends."

traits.locale_text: "Ve de karanlığa doğru olan yolculuğunda İmparator'un sana aydınlanma nasip etmesini ve {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}kalbini öğretilerimize açmasını{/d} dilemek için. Öyle bir şey olur ise, gelip beni bul. Belki o zaman tarikatımızı yakın dostların arasına almaya karar verirsin."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
